metadata.title: Package tftp Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package tftp should be removed.

metadata.title: Package openssh-server Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package openssh-server should be removed.

metadata.title: Red Hat Release and Auxiliary gpg-pubkey Packages Installed
metadata.description: The Red Hat release and auxiliary key packages are required to be installed.

criteria.comment: packages gpg-pubkey-fd431d51-4ae0493b and gpg-pubkey-2fa658e0-45700c69 are installed

metadata.title: Package httpd Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package httpd should be removed.

metadata.title: Audit User/Group Modification
metadata.description: Audit user/group modification.

metadata.title: Ensure /var/log/audit Located On Separate Partition
metadata.description: Audit logs are stored in the /var/log/audit directory. Ensure that it has its own partition or logical volume. Make absolutely certain that it is large enough to store all audit logs that will be created by the auditing daemon.

metadata.title: Ensure /tmp Located On Separate Partition
metadata.description: The /tmp directory is a world-writable directory used for temporary file storage. Verify that it has its own partition or logical volume.

metadata.title: Service chronyd Or Service ntpd Enabled
metadata.description: At least one of the chronyd or ntpd services should be enabled if possible.

criteria.comment: chronyd or ntpd service enabled

metadata.title: Package vsftpd Installed
metadata.description: The RPM package vsftpd should be installed.

metadata.title: Set ClientAliveCountMax for User Logins
metadata.description: The SSH ClientAliveCountMax should be set to an appropriate value (and dependencies are met)

criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

metadata.title: Audit Discretionary Access Control Modification Events - lchown
metadata.description: The changing of file permissions and attributes should be audited.

metadata.title: Set Password retry Requirements
metadata.description: The password retry should meet minimum requirements

criteria.comment: Conditions for retry are satisfied
system is RHEL6 with pam_cracklib configured
system is RHEL7 with pam_pwquality configured
system is Fedora with pam_pwquality configured

metadata.title: Package net-snmp Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package net-snmp should be removed.

metadata.title: Audit File Deletion Events
metadata.description: Audit files deletion events.

metadata.title: Package ntp Installed
metadata.description: The RPM package ntp should be installed.

metadata.title: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7
metadata.description: The operating system installed on the system is Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7

criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 Workstation is installed
Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 Server is installed

metadata.title: File grub.cfg Permissions
metadata.description: File permissions for grub.cfg should be set to 0600 (or stronger). By default, this file is located at /boot/grub2/grub.cfg or, for EFI systems, at /boot/efi/EFI/redhat/grub.cfg

metadata.title: Set Last Login/Access Notification
metadata.description: Configure the system to notify users of last login/access using pam_lastlog.

metadata.title: CentOS 6
metadata.description: The operating system installed on the system is CentOS 6

criterion.comment: Installed operating system is part of the unix family

metadata.title: Audit Discretionary Access Control Modification Events - fsetxattr
metadata.description: The changing of file permissions and attributes should be audited.

metadata.title: Verify that System Executables Have Restrictive Permissions
metadata.description: Checks that binary files under /bin, /sbin, /usr/bin, /usr/sbin, /usr/local/bin, and /usr/local/sbin, are not group-writable or world-writable.

metadata.title: Package dconf Installed
metadata.description: The RPM package dconf should be installed.

metadata.title: Set Maximum Number of Concurrent Login Sessions Per User
metadata.description: The maximum number of concurrent login sessions per user should meet minimum requirements.

criteria.comment: the value maxlogins should be set appropriately in /etc/security/limits.conf

metadata.title: Restrict Serial Port Root Logins
metadata.description: Preventing direct root login to serial port interfaces helps ensure accountability for actions taken on the system using the root account.

metadata.title: Disable Empty Passwords
metadata.description: Remote connections from accounts with empty passwords should be disabled (and dependencies are met)

criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

metadata.title: Service qpidd Disabled
metadata.description: The qpidd service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package qpid-cpp-server removed or service qpidd is not configured to start
service qpidd is not configured to start

metadata.title: Find setgid files system packages
metadata.description: All files with setgid should be owned by a base system package

metadata.title: Ensure /home Located On Separate Partition
metadata.description: If user home directories will be stored locally, create a separate partition for /home. If /home will be mounted from another system such as an NFS server, then creating a separate partition is not necessary at this time, and the mountpoint can instead be configured later.

metadata.title: Ensure Only Protocol 2 Connections Allowed
metadata.description: The OpenSSH daemon should be running protocol 2.

criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

metadata.title: Auditd Action to Take When Maximum Log Size Reached
metadata.description: max_log_file_action setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to a certain action

metadata.title: Disable dccp Kernel Module
metadata.description: The kernel module dccp should be disabled.

metadata.title: Service abrtd Disabled
metadata.description: The abrtd service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package abrt removed or service abrtd is not configured to start
service abrtd is not configured to start

metadata.title: System Login Banner Compliance
metadata.description: The system login banner text should be set correctly.

metadata.title: Record Attempts to Alter Time Through Stime
metadata.description: Record attempts to alter time through stime. Note that on 64-bit architectures the stime system call is not defined in the audit system calls lookup table.

criteria.comment: 32-bit or 64-bit system
audit augenrules or audit auditctl
audit augenrules stime
audit auditctl stime

metadata.title: Test for x86 Architecture
metadata.description: Generic test for x86 architecture to be used by other tests

metadata.title: Package prelink Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package prelink should be removed.

metadata.title: Verify user who owns 'shadow' file
metadata.description: The /etc/shadow file should be owned by the appropriate user.

metadata.title: Verify No netrc Files Exist
metadata.description: The .netrc files contain login information used to auto-login into FTP servers and reside in the user's home directory. Any .netrc files should be removed.

metadata.title: Proper Permissions User Home Directories
metadata.description: File permissions should be set correctly for the home directories for all user accounts.

metadata.title: SNMP use newer protocols
metadata.description: SNMP version 1 and 2c must not be enabled.

metadata.title: Audit Information Export To Media
metadata.description: Audit rules that detect the mounting of filesystems should be enabled.

metadata.title: Set Accounts to Expire Following Password Expiration
metadata.description: The accounts should be configured to expire automatically following password expiration.

criteria.comment: the value INACTIVE parameter should be set appropriately in /etc/default/useradd

metadata.title: Package ypbind Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package ypbind should be removed.

metadata.title: Package screen Installed
metadata.description: The RPM package screen should be installed.

metadata.title: Package dhcp Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package dhcp should be removed.

metadata.title: Implement Blank Screensaver
metadata.description: The GNOME3 screensaver should be blank.

criteria.comment: Enable blank screensaver and prevent user from changing it

criterion.comment: screensaver prevent user from changing mode

metadata.title: Record Events that Modify the System's Network Environment
metadata.description: The network environment should not be modified by anything other than administrator action. Any change to network parameters should be audited.

metadata.title: Set Password lcredit Requirements
metadata.description: The password lcredit should meet minimum requirements

criteria.comment: conditions for lcredit are satisfied

metadata.title: Ensure insecure_locks is disabled
metadata.description: Allowing insecure file locking could allow for sensitive data to be viewed or edited by an unauthorized user.

criterion.comment: Check for insecure NFS locks in /etc/exports

metadata.title: Service oddjobd Disabled
metadata.description: The oddjobd service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package oddjob removed or service oddjobd is not configured to start
service oddjobd is not configured to start

metadata.title: Disable GNOME3 Automounting
metadata.description: The system's default desktop environment, GNOME3, will mount devices and removable media (such as DVDs, CDs and USB flash drives) whenever they are inserted into the system. Disable automount and autorun within GNOME3.

criteria.comment: Disable GNOME3 automount/autorun and prevent user from changing it

criterion.comment: Prevent user from changing automount setting
Prevent user from changing automount-open setting
Prevent user from changing autorun setting

metadata.title: Package telnet-server Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package telnet-server should be removed.

metadata.description: The SSH idle timeout interval should be set to an appropriate value.

criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

metadata.title: Disable telnet Service
metadata.description: Disable telnet Service

criteria.comment: package telnet-server removed or service telnetd is not configured to start

metadata.title: Implement Local DB for DConf User Profile
metadata.description: The DConf User profile should have the local DB configured.

metadata.title: Ensure auditd Collects Information on the Use of Privileged Commands
metadata.description: Audit rules about the information on the use of privileged commands are enabled.

criterion.comment: audit augenrules binaries count matches rules count
audit auditctl binaries count matches rules count

metadata.description: The RPM package vsftpd should be removed.

metadata.description: Idle activation of the screen saver should be enabled.

metadata.description: The RPM package openldap-servers should be removed.

metadata.description: The RPM package aide should be installed.

metadata.description: The RPM package autofs should be removed.

metadata.description: Enable the GUI warning banner.

metadata.title: File grub.cfg Owned By root User
metadata.description: The grub.cfg file should be owned by the root user. By default, this file is located at /boot/grub2/grub.cfg or, for EFI systems, at /boot/efi/EFI/redhat/grub.cfg

metadata.description: The password expiration warning age should be set appropriately.

metadata.description: The grub.cfg file should be owned by the root group. By default, this file is located at /boot/grub2/grub.cfg or, for EFI systems, at /boot/efi/EFI/redhat/grub.cfg

metadata.description: The changing of file permissions and attributes should be audited.

metadata.title: Verify /etc/gshadow Permissions
metadata.description: This test makes sure that /etc/gshadow is owned by 0, group owned by 0, and has mode 0000. If the target file or directory has an extended ACL then it will fail the mode check.

metadata.description: The password minclass should meet the minimum requirements

metadata.description: The RPM package setroubleshoot should be removed.

metadata.description: The RPM package rsh-server should be removed.

metadata.description: active setting in /etc/audisp/plugins.d/syslog.conf is set to 'yes'

metadata.title: Set Password Hashing Algorithm in /etc/pam.d/system-auth
metadata.description: The password hashing algorithm should be set correctly in /etc/pam.d/system-auth.

metadata.title: Service firewalld Enabled
metadata.description: The firewalld service should be enabled if possible.

metadata.title: Ensure /var Located On Separate Partition
metadata.description: Ensuring that /var is mounted on its own partition enables the setting of more restrictive mount options, which is used as temporary storage by many program, particularly system services such as daemons. It is not uncommon for the /var directory to contain world-writable directories, installed by other software packages.

metadata.description: SSH host-based authentication should be disabled.

criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

metadata.description: The kernel runtime parameter "kernel.randomize_va_space" should be set to "2".

metadata.title: Restrict Virtual Console Root Logins
metadata.description: Preventing direct root login to virtual console devices helps ensure accountability for actions taken on the system using the root account.

metadata.description: The /etc/gshadow file should be owned by the appropriate group.

metadata.title: Package chrony Installed

metadata.description: space_left_action setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to a certain action

metadata.description: The /etc/shadow file should be owned by the appropriate group.

metadata.description: The /etc/group file should be owned by the appropriate user.

metadata.title: Ensure /var/log Located On Separate Partition
metadata.description: System logs are stored in the /var/log directory. Ensure that it has its own partition or logical volume.

metadata.title: Verify /etc/passwd Permissions
metadata.description: This test makes sure that /etc/passwd is owned by 0, group owned by 0, and has mode 0644 (or stronger). If the target file or directory has an extended ACL then it will fail the mode check.

metadata.title: Verify File Ownership And Permissions Using RPM
metadata.description: Verify the integrity of installed packages by comparing the installed files with information about the files taken from the package metadata stored in the RPM database.

group ownership of all files matches local rpm database
mode of all files matches local rpm database

metadata.description: The RPM package iputils should be removed.

metadata.title: Ensure the logrotate utility performs the automatic rotation of log files on daily basis
metadata.description: The frequency of automatic log files rotation performed by the logrotate utility should be configured to run daily

criteria.comment: /etc/logrotate.conf contains daily setting or /etc/cron.daily/logrotate file exists

criterion.comment: Check if daily is set in /etc/logrotate.conf
Check if /etc/cron.daily/logrotate file exists (and calls logrotate)

metadata.title: Disable bluetooth Kernel Module
metadata.description: The kernel module bluetooth should be disabled.

metadata.title: Verify group who owns 'passwd' file
metadata.description: The /etc/passwd file should be owned by the appropriate group.

metadata.title: Package rsyslog Installed
metadata.description: The RPM package rsyslog should be installed.

metadata.title: Set Password Expiration Parameters
metadata.description: The password minimum length should be set appropriately.

metadata.title: Audit Kernel Module Loading and Unloading
metadata.description: The audit rules should be configured to log information about kernel module loading and unloading.

metadata.title: Audit Discretionary Access Control Modification Events - removexattr
metadata.description: The changing of file permissions and attributes should be audited.

metadata.title: Audit Discretionary Access Control Modification Events - fchmod
metadata.description: The changing of file permissions and attributes should be audited.

metadata.title: Kernel Runtime Parameter IPv6 Check
metadata.description: Disables IPv6 for all network interfaces.

criterion.comment: Disable IPv6 in sysctl.d conf file

metadata.title: Record Attempts to Alter Time Through Clock_settime
metadata.description: Record attempts to alter time through clock_settime.

metadata.title: Service autofs Disabled
metadata.description: The autofs service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package autofs removed or service autofs is not configured to start
service autofs is not configured to start

metadata.title: Audit Discretionary Access Control Modification Events - lremovexattr
metadata.description: The changing of file permissions and attributes should be audited.

metadata.title: Ensure that Users Have Sensible Umask Values set for csh
metadata.description: The default umask for users of the csh shell

metadata.title: Service chronyd Enabled
metadata.description: The chronyd service should be enabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package chrony installed and service chronyd is configured to start
service chronyd is configured to start

metadata.title: Package telnet Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package telnet should be removed.

metadata.title: Enable GNOME3 Screensaver Lock After Idle Period
metadata.description: Idle activation of the screen lock should be enabled.

criteria.comment: Enable screensaver lock and prevent user from changing it

criterion.comment: screensaver lock prevent user from changing
screensaver lock delay is set correctly
prevent user from changing screensaver lock delay
screensaver lock delay is set correctly
prevent user from changing screensaver lock delay

metadata.title: Package bind Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package bind should be removed.

metadata.title: Ensure that Users Have Sensible Umask Values set for bash
metadata.description: The default umask for users of the bash shell

metadata.title: Configure the GNOME3 GUI Screen locking
metadata.description: The allowed period of inactivity before the screensaver is activated.

criteria.comment: check screensaver idle delay and prevent user from changing it

criterion.comment: prevent user from changing idle delay

metadata.title: Write permissions are disabled for group and other in all directories in Root's Path
metadata.description: Check each directory in root's path and make use it does not grant write permission to group and other

criteria.comment: Check that write permission to group and other in root's path is denied

criterion.comment: Check for write permission to group and other in root's path

metadata.title: All Password Hashes Shadowed
metadata.description: All password hashes should be shadowed.

metadata.title: Disable .rhosts Files
metadata.description: Emulation of the rsh command through the ssh server should be disabled (and dependencies are met)

criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

metadata.title: Service ntpd Enabled
metadata.description: The ntpd service should be enabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package ntp installed and service ntpd is configured to start
service ntpd is configured to start

metadata.title: Set Password minlen Requirements
metadata.description: The password minlen should meet minimum requirements

criteria.comment: system uses pam_pwquality configured

metadata.title: Verify /var/log/audit Permissions
metadata.description: Checks for correct permissions for all log files in /var/log/audit.

metadata.title: Set Password ucredit Requirements
metadata.description: The password ucredit should meet minimum requirements

criteria.comment: conditions for ucredit are satisfied

metadata.title: Package talk Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package talk should be removed.

metadata.title: System Accounts Do Not Run a Shell
metadata.description: The root account is the only system account that should have a login shell.

criterion.comment: tests for the presence of login shells (not /sbin/nologin) for system accounts in /etc/passwd file

metadata.title: Package qpid-cpp-server Removed
metadata.description: The RPM package qpid-cpp-server should be removed.

metadata.title: Disable Prelinking
metadata.description: The prelinking feature can interfere with the operation of checksum integrity tools (e.g. AIDE), mitigates the protection provided by ASLR, and requires additional CPU cycles by software upgrades.

criteria.comment: Conditions for prelinking disabled are satisfied
System is RHEL6 with prelinking disabled
System is RHEL7 or Fedora and prelink RPM is not installed or prelinking is disabled
System is RHEL7 or Fedora
prelink RPM package not installed or prelinking disabled

metadata.title: Auditd Maximum Number of Logs to Retain
metadata.description: num_logs setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to at least a certain value

metadata.title: Set Password ocredit Requirements
metadata.description: The password ocredit should meet minimum requirements

criteria.comment: conditions for ocredit are satisfied

metadata.title: Specify a Remote NTP Server for Time Data
metadata.description: A remote NTP Server for time synchronization should be specified (and dependencies are met)

criteria.comment: ntp.conf conditions are met

metadata.title: Lock out account after failed login attempts
metadata.description: The number of allowed failed logins should be set correctly.

metadata.title: Service rsyslog Enabled
metadata.description: The rsyslog service should be enabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package rsyslog installed and service rsyslog is configured to start
service rsyslog is configured to start

metadata.title: Service rdisc Disabled
metadata.description: The rdisc service should be disabled if possible.

criteria.comment: package iputils removed or service rdisc is not configured to start
service rdisc is not configured to start

metadata.title: Auditd Maximum Log File Size
metadata.description: max_log_file setting in /etc/audit/auditd.conf is set to at least a certain value

metadata.title: Make Audit Configuration Immutable
metadata.description: Force a reboot to change audit rules is enabled

metadata.title: Package firewalld Installed
metadata.description: The RPM package firewalld should be installed.

metadata.title: Record Attempts to Alter Time Through the Localtime File
metadata.description: Record attempts to alter time through /etc/localtime.

metadata.title: Verify that Shared Library Files Have Restrictive Permissions
metadata.description: Checks that /lib, /lib64, /usr/lib, /usr/lib64, /lib/modules, and objects therein, are not group-writable or world-writable.

metadata.title: SNMP default communities disabled
metadata.description: SNMP default communities must be removed.

metadata.title: Do Not Allow Users to Set Environment Options
metadata.description: PermitUserEnvironment should be disabled

criteria.comment: SSH is not being used or conditions are met

metadata.title: Ensure that Users Have Sensible Umask Values in /etc/profile
metadata.description: The default umask for all users should be set correctly

linux:rpminfo_test.comment: Red Hat release key package is installed
Red Hat auxiliary key package is installed

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Tests the value of the ClientAliveCountMax setting in the /etc/ssh/sshd_config file

ind:family_test.comment: installed OS part of unix family
installed OS part of unix family

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: the value maxlogins should be set appropriately in /etc/security/limits.conf
Tests the value of the PermitEmptyPasswords[\s]*(<:nocomment:>*) setting in the /etc/ssh/sshd_config file
the value INACTIVE parameter should be set appropriately in /etc/default/useradd
blank screensaver cannot be changed by user
Tests the value of the insecure locks in /etc/exports
Prevent user from changing automount setting
Prevent user from changing automount-open setting
Prevent user from changing autorun setting

ind:variable_test.comment: audit augenrules binaries count matches rules count
audit auditctl binaries count matches rules count

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Tests the value of the Banner[\s]+/etc/issue setting in the /etc/ssh/sshd_config file
test the value of flush parameter in /etc/audit/auditd.conf
Tests the value of the PermitRootLogin[\s]*(<:nocomment:>*) setting in the /etc/ssh/sshd_config file
CPE vendor is 'fedoraproject' and 'product' is fedora

ind:variable_test.comment: The value of ENCRYPT_METHOD should be set appropriately in /etc/login.defs
Test the retrieved /etc/login.defs umask value(s) match the var_accounts_user_umask requirement

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: make sure nullok is not used in /etc/pam.d/system-auth
GUI banner cannot be changed by user
login banner text is correctly set

ind:variable_test.comment: The value of PASS_WARN_AGE should be set appropriately in /etc/login.defs

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: tests the value of MACs setting in the /etc/ssh/sshd_config file

unix:sysctl_test.comment: kernel runtime parameter kernel.randomize_va_space set to 2

linux:rpmverifyfile_test.comment: user ownership of all files matches local rpm database
group ownership of all files matches local rpm database
mode of all files matches local rpm database

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: superuser is defined in /etc/grub2.cfg files. Superuser is not root, admin, or administrator
make sure a password is defined in /etc/grub2.cfg

ind:variable_test.comment: Test the retrieved /etc/init.d/functions umask value(s) match the var_umask_for_daemons requirement

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: GUI user list cannot be enabled
Tests the value of the ^[\s]*SELINUXTYPE[\s]*=[\s]*([^#]*) expression in the /etc/selinux/config file

ind:variable_test.comment: The value of PASS_MAX_DAYS should be set appropriately in /etc/login.defs

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: The password hashing algorithm should be set correctly in /etc/libuser.conf
check for existence of gpgcheck=0 in /etc/yum.repos.d/ files

ind:variable_test.comment: The value of PASS_MIN_DAYS should be set appropriately in /etc/login.defs

unix:sysctl_test.comment: kernel runtime parameter kernel.exec-shield set to 1

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Ensure at least one NTP server is set
GUI banner cannot be changed by user
Tests that /sbin/sulogin was not removed from the default systemd rescue.service to ensure that a password must be entered to access single user mode
Tests that the systemd rescue.service is in the runlevel1.target
Tests the value of the ^[\s]*BOOTPROTO[\s]*=[\s]*([^#]*) expression in the /etc/sysconfig/network-scripts/ifcfg-.* file
test that there are no accounts with UID 0 except root in the /etc/passwd file
Check pam_faillock.so preauth silent present in /etc/pam.d/system-auth
Check maximum failed login attempts allowed in /etc/pam.d/system-auth (authfail)
Check if pam_faillock_so is called in account phase of /etc/pam.d/system-auth
Check pam_faillock.so preauth silent present in /etc/pam.d/password-auth
Check maximum failed login attempts allowed in /etc/pam.d/password-auth (authfail)
Check if pam_faillock_so is called in account phase of /etc/pam.d/password-auth
tests the value of Ciphers setting in the /etc/ssh/sshd_config file
Tests the presence of daily setting in /etc/logrotate.conf file
Tests the existence of /etc/cron.daily/logrotate file (and verify it actually calls logrotate utility)

ind:variable_test.comment: The value of PASS_MIN_LEN should be set appropriately in /etc/login.defs

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: Disable IPv6 in sysctl.d conf file

ind:variable_test.comment: Test the retrieved /etc/csh.cshrc umask value(s) match the var_accounts_user_umask requirement

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: screensaver lock cannot be changed by user
screensaver lock delay cannot be changed by user

ind:variable_test.comment: Test the retrieved /etc/bashrc umask value(s) match the var_accounts_user_umask requirement

ind:textfilecontent54_test.comment: user cannot change screensaver idle delay
screensaver idle delay setting is correct

unix:file_test.comment: Check if there aren't directories in root's path having write permission set for group or other

tests for the presence of login shells (not /sbin/nologin) for system accounts in /etc/passwd file

check authfail maximum failed login attempts allowed in /etc/pam.d/system-auth
check authfail maximum failed login attempts allowed in /etc/pam.d/password-auth
check preauth maximum failed login attempts allowed in /etc/pam.d/password-auth

ind:variable_test.comment: Test the retrieved /etc/profile umask value(s) match the var_accounts_user_umask requirement

unix:file_object.comment: system files with setuid or setgid permission set
